title: Dashboard

step1.description: To start, paste the Session ID of the account your bot is running on

fields.name: Name
fields.checkbox1:: My bot is not about adult content or drugs
fields.checkbox2: My bot does not distribute materials protected by copyright
fields.checkbox3: My bot does not violate the laws and other rules of the site
fields.checkbox4: I understand that my bot will be automatically tested for violations and I do not plan to change the bot's theme after launch to cheat the moderation system
fields.checkbox5: I understand that my bot and my account can be deleted at any time without warning by the site moderators

step2.description: To verify that you are author of this bot, please add the following command

not_authorized: You are not authorized to view this page
